flawed_nl_solution:
If Anika is 30 now, in 15 years, she'll be 30+15=<<30+15=45>>45 years old.
At 30, Anika is 4/3 the age of Maddie, meaning Maddie is 4/3*30=<<4/3*30=90/4>>90/4 years.
In 15 years, Maddie will be 90/4+15=<<90/4+15=75/2>>75/2 years old.
Their total age in 15 years will be 75/2+45=<<75/2+45=165/2>>165/2
Their average age in 15 years will be 165/2/2=<<165/2/2=165/4>>165/4
#### 165/4

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 90/4. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
